statements: DELETE FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 50 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 123 AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM audit_trails WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' OR (user_id = 456 AND action = 'logout');
DELETE FROM investigations WHERE investigation_end_date IS NULL;
DELETE FROM audit_trails WHERE audit_id = 100 AND audit_type = 'Login';
DELETE FROM examinations WHERE examiner_id = 50 AND date_of_exam < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM investigation WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe';
